item.description:
Hike the trails, climb down into the canyon, explore the caves, and enjoy a picnic up top where we'll all park with fellow freethinkers as the damned are purified.

We'll temporarily gather from 9:50-10:00 AM in the gated, free-for-employees Quest Diagnostic parking lot at 43 Columbia Street in Cambridge, MA (call Jody at 615-974-3103 to have him open the gate for you) and head out no later than 10:15. Those taking the T can exit the Red Line Central Square Station and walk 4-5 blocks to join us there. We should arrive at Purgatory just after 11 and can start exploring before a mid-afternoon picnic.


Please note if you can help us carpool, otherwise bring $10 for your driver's gas and the turnpike tolls. And discuss in the comments what food/drinks you would like to bring. For example, we still need chips, dip, napkins, bread, cold cuts, spreads, etc. Remember to bring enough for everyone (11 people).


Required: 1-2 group picnic items. Recommended: hiking shoes, water and snacks, sunscreen, bug spray, camera, first aid kit.


Drivers: James (4), Jarred (4), Nicole (4), and Benny (2).


Current Communal Picnic Contributions:
· Jody & James: Charcoal, Lighter Fluid, S'mores, 3 Chips, Napkins
· Jarred: 2-Liters and Cups
· Paul & Guest: Hamburgers, Condiments, Plates, Forks
· Emilie: Veggies and Dip
· Benny & Guest: Hot Dogs, Cheese, Potato Salad, Plates
· Mar: TBD
· Lesley: Fruit Salad, Cups, and Spoons
· Gayle and Nichole: Chocolate Chip Cookies and TBD
item.name: Atheists in Purgatory
